title: Are there any homeopathic COVID-19 vaccines out there yet for those who have antagonistic pre-existing vaccine related conditions?
description: Answer (1 of 11): There is no such thing as a "homeopathic vaccine." Homeopathy is "a system of medical practice that treats a disease especially by the administration of minute doses of a remedy that would in larger amounts produce in healthy persons symptoms similar to those of the disease."
